== Hp Compaq 2510p ==
Testing of the Ubuntu 10.10 Maverick Meerkat Distribution on a Hp Compaq 2510p.
<<BR>>Tester: Francesco Ruvolo
<<BR>>LaunchPad Account: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ruvolof|~ruvolof]]</nowiki>

'''Note: I didn't some tests for following reasons:'''
<<BR>>hiw-001 Test Picture: Hp Compaq 2510p hasn't integrated webcam
<<BR>>khk-00?: Hp Compaq 2510p hasn't these keys
<<BR>>hmp-00?: Hp Compaq 2510p hasn't PS/2 port
<<BR>>hmt-001: Hp Compaq 2510p hasn't trackpad
<<BR>>hme-002: I haven't a microphone at the moment, probably I will test it later
